title: M8: Basic assets
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: elementary. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 1 minute. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: you will hear that NMT needs, data, parallel data, bilingual data, corpora, bilingual corpora, parallel sentences, bitexts, etc. are translations, previous translations that translators (or other machine translation systems) did. We want people to be aware of that previous translations is the basic asset and that without past translations, there would be no machine translation.
